record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JUNE 25, 2007, at 1 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 2:16 p.m., adjourned until Monday, June 25, 2007, at 1 p.m.
